ngxauthfirebaseui.resetPasswordErrorRequiredText: E-mail is required to reset the password!
ngxauthfirebaseui.resetPasswordErrorPatternText: Please enter a valid e-mail address
ngxauthfirebaseui.resetPasswordInstructionsText: Reset requested. Check your e-mail instructions.
ngxauthfirebaseui.emailConfirmationText:
A confirmation e-mail has been sent to you.
  Check your inbox and click on the link "Confirm my e-mail" to confirm your e-mail address.
ngxauthfirebaseui.phoneHintText:
The phone number is international. Therefore, it should start with a + sign or 00, followed by the country code, - and national number e.g: +49-12345678 or 0041-1234567890

 NOTE : the phone number must be a valid phone credential !
ngxauthfirebaseui.phoneErrorPatternText: Please enter a valid phone number
